Package ohos.bluetooth

Class HandsFreeAudioGateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bluetooth.HandsFreeAudioGateway
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProfileBase

    public final class HandsFreeAudioGateway
extends Object
implements ProfileBase
    Manages HandsFreeAudioGateway (HFP AG) profiles.

    The static method getProfile(ohos.app.Context) is used to obtain HandsFreeAudioGateway instances.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String EVENT_AUDIO_STATE_UPDATE
      The event indicates audio state change.
      static int SCO_STATE_CONNECTED
      Indicates that an SCO link has been set up with the peer device.
      static int SCO_STATE_CONNECTING
      Indicates that an SCO link is being set up with the peer device.
      static int SCO_STATE_DISCONNECTED
      Indicates that no SCO link has been set up with the peer device.

      • Fields inherited from interface ohos.bluetooth.ProfileBase

    • Method Detail

      • getProfile

        public static HandsFreeAudioGateway getProfile​(Context context)
        Obtains the default HandsFreeAudioGateway instance to perform an operation.
        Parameters:
        context - Ability context that contains package name
        Returns:
        Returns the default HandsFreeAudioGateway instance.

      • getDevicesByStates

        public List<BluetoothRemoteDevice> getDevicesByStates​(int[] states)
        Description copied from interface: ProfileBase
        Obtains the list of devices in the specified status.
        Specified by:
        getDevicesByStates in interface ProfileBase
        Parameters:
        states - Indicates the connection status, which can be ProfileBase.STATE_DISCONNECTED, ProfileBase.STATE_CONNECTING, ProfileBase.STATE_CONNECTED, or ProfileBase.STATE_DISCONNECTING.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of BluetoothRemoteDevice matching the specified status.

      • getDeviceState

        public int getDeviceState​(BluetoothRemoteDevice device)
        Description copied from interface: ProfileBase
        Obtains the connection status of a BluetoothRemoteDevice in the current profile.
        Specified by:
        getDeviceState in interface ProfileBase
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BluetoothRemoteDevice.
        Returns:
        Returns the connection status, which can be ProfileBase.STATE_DISCONNECTED, ProfileBase.STATE_CONNECTING, ProfileBase.STATE_CONNECTED, or ProfileBase.STATE_DISCONNECTING.

      • getScoState

        public int getScoState​(BluetoothRemoteDevice device)
        Obtains the status of a HandsFree SCO link between the current device and the peer device.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the peer device, which is set by BluetoothRemoteDevice.
        Returns:
        Returns the SCO link status, which can be SCO_STATE_CONNECTED, SCO_STATE_CONNECTING, or SCO_STATE_DISCONNECTED.

      • openVoiceRecognition

        public boolean openVoiceRecognition​(BluetoothRemoteDevice device)
        Enables Bluetooth voice recognition.

        This method is called to establish a Bluetooth audio channel when the audio gateway receives an AT command for voice recognition from the headset.

        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the Bluetooth headset.
        Returns:
        Returns true if Bluetooth voice recognition is enabled; returns false if no headset is connected, the connected headset does not support voice recognition, or voice recognition has already been enabled.
        Since:
        3

      • closeVoiceRecognition

        public boolean closeVoiceRecognition​(BluetoothRemoteDevice device)
        Disables Bluetooth voice recognition and the Bluetooth audio channel.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the Bluetooth headset.
        Returns:
        Returns true if Bluetooth voice recognition is disabled; returns false if no headset is connected or voice recognition is not enabled.
        Since:
        3

      • connectSco

        public boolean connectSco​()
        Create an audio channel connection.

        Listen event EVENT_AUDIO_STATE_UPDATE to get audio state update after calling this function.

        Returns:
        true means the command has been sent, otherwise false.

      • disconnectSco

        public boolean disconnectSco​()
        Disconnect an audio channel connection.

        Listen event EVENT_AUDIO_STATE_UPDATE to get audio state update after calling this function.

        Returns:
        true means the command has been sent, otherwise false.

      • getConnectedDevices

        public List<BluetoothRemoteDevice> getConnectedDevices​()
        Obtains the list of connected Bluetooth devices.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of connected Bluetooth devices.
        Since:
        3
